name: Engine of Alignment: Project Guidelines
description: Ruleset for maintaining structural, creative, and philosophical alignment across all projects housed in this repository. Supports clarity, innovation, and fulfillment across eight domains.

rules.title: Honor the Eight Categories
rules.description: Every major commit must reference its primary category (e.g., Life in Motion, Pillars of Clarity) to ensure alignment with the overall life architecture.

rules.title: Balance Innovation with Stability
rules.description: Experimental branches are encouraged but must tie back to a documented progression plan before merging.

rules.title: Clarity Over Complexity
rules.description: Prioritize clear structures and elegant simplicity. Each pull request should state how it advances clarity.

rules.title: Progress Through Refinement
rules.description: Small, meaningful iterations are favored over sweeping changes. Growth is evolutionary.

rules.title: Teach As You Build
rules.description: Document major features with simple, clear explanations to guide future collaborators.

rules.title: Uphold Integrity
rules.description: Content must honor emotional resonance, intellectual rigor, and the human spirit.

rules.title: Sustainability Matters
rules.description: Design with the long arc in mind. Avoid technical debt and build for the future.

rules.title: Celebrate Alignment
rules.description: Significant milestones deserve documentation and reflection in the changelog.

author: Life Architect: Engine of Alignment | M.L. T
